content: I've modified an MIR opt that yields improved performance in some cases; unfortunately, this breaks the test for the early_otherwise_branch opt. I would go and fix this, but it requires changing a number of things and I am not sure that my changes will survive the unsoundness fix (whenever that happens). Should I try and do it anyway? If not, what's the best way to proceed?
Nvm, let me fix that opt first and then I dont have to decide
